job_title: Intern - DRAM Quality Data Analytics Engineer
job_description:
• We will assign you a keystone project to develop critical thinking and problem solving skills while exposing you to key challenges in semiconductor manufacturing.
• We will partner you with an experienced member of the team to ensure your project is successful.
• Deep understanding of statistics applied to data analysis, especially in the area of reliability Candidates must still be enrolled in school and have a graduation date after September 2026.
• Experience using Linux based operating systems and cloud computing systems (GCP, AWS, etc) Experience with data visualization software such as Tableau, PowerBI, JMP, etc.
• We will also give you short term projects to expose you to different areas within the company.
• You will give training to global teams on the tools you create and the insights you draw.
• We also want you to share code, knowledge and lessons learned to make sure the whole team is on the cutting edge.
• Familiarity with common semiconductor reliability tests and failure mechanisms Familiarity with basic DRAM operation and semiconductor manufacturing Principal Product Engineer (Advance Data Analytics), Heterogeneous Integration Group (HIG), High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) Product EngineeringSingapore, SingaporePosted 3 months ago Working towards BS/MS/Ph.

• Ensuring projects are properly prioritized and that deliverables and timelines are in line with constraint dates and business needs.
• Demonstrate basic programming skill with one of the following environment: SQL, Angular, C#, Java/JavaScript.
• Completes all required safety training and ensures all work is conducted in accordance with safety policies Ensure availability and accuracy of documentation to empower users to self-diagnose issues where possible The ability to deliver comprehensive solutions to address root cause through systematic analysis.
• Support and provide technical expertise for area management decision making (including queue time management, equipment and recipe releases, and general workstation optimization) Ensure availability and currency of documentation to enable all on call team members to support first-level investigation and resolution of IT ticket for OI system Support and provide technical expertise for line management decision making (including linearity, cycle time, line yield, wafer starts and output optimization) The ability to utilize Industrial Engineering concepts (queueing theory, lean, theory of constraints, Little’s Law, scheduling, etc.
• ) to implement solutions.
• The ability to provide fast and repeatable data mining through the use of relational databases.
